Original Text: Als je vaak wordt gebeten door muggen kan dat aan je zeepkeuze liggen Een bekend grootmoeders weetje tegen muggen is om je goed in te zepen in bad of onder de douche De gedachte is dat ze je lichaamsgeur dan niet kunnen ruiken Maar nieuw onderzoek toont aan dat dit juist averechts kan werken Door veel zeepjes kun je juist aantrekkelijker worden voor muggen zeggen Amerikaanse wetenschappers
Translated Text: If you're often bitten by mosquitoes, that can be due to your choice of soaps.A well-known grandmother's Fact is against mosquitoes to soak you well in the bathtub or in the shower.The thought is that they won't be able to smell your body smell.

Original Text: Archeologen vinden 300000 jaar oude menselijke voetafdrukken in Duitsland In Duitsland zijn voetafdrukken gevonden van zon 300000 jaar oud Ze zijn van de homo heidelbergensis een uitgestorven mensensoort
Translated Text: Archaeologists find 300000-year-old human footprints in Germany In Germany, footprints are found from the Sun 300000 years old They are an extinct human species of homo heidelbergensis

Original Text: Lot van de aarde is voor het eerst vastgelegd ster slokt planeet in één keer op Wetenschappers hebben voor het eerst vastgelegd hoe een planeet in één keer wordt opgeslokt door een stervende ster Datzelfde lot wacht onze aarde ook maar dat duurt nog miljarden jaren
Translated Text: Earth's fate is for the first time captured star swallows planet at once on Scientists have for the first time captured how a planet is swallowed up at once by a dying star That same fate awaits our earth but that still lasts billions of years

Original Text: El Niño is terug bosbranden modderstromen en een nieuw hitterecord Het water van de Grote Oceaan warmt op dit moment langzaam op een voorteken van een naderende El Niño Dit zorgt voor extreem weer in grote delen van de wereld Samen met de opwarming van de aarde zal El Niño hoogstwaarschijnlijk leiden tot een nieuw wereldwijd hitterecord zegt het hoofd klimaatonderzoek van NASA tegen NUnl  mogelijk al in 2023
Translated Text: El Niño is back forest fires mud currents and a new heat record The water of the Pacific is now slowly warming up to an omen of an approaching El Niño This creates extreme weather in large parts of the world Together with global warming, El Niño will most likely lead to a new global heat record says NASA's head climate research against NUnl as early as 2023

Original Text: Archeologen ontdekken 7000 jaar oude weg onder bodem van Adriatische Zee Archeologen hebben diep in de Adriatische Zee een bijzondere vondst gedaan Vlak voor de Kroatische kust ontdekten ze op een paar meter onder de zeemodder een weg die zevenduizend jaar geleden is aangelegd De weg ligt op een kunstmatig eiland dat in 2021 onder de zeespiegel werd ontdekt
Translated Text: Archaeologists discover 7000 year old road under the bottom of Adriatic Sea Archaeologists have made a special find deep in the Adriatic Sea Just off the Croatian coast, they discovered a road that was built seven thousand years ago.The road is on an artificial island that was discovered in 2021 below sea level.

Original Text: DNA van vrouw uit steentijd gevonden op twintigduizend jaar oud sieraad Op een ongeveer twintigduizend jaar oud sieraad is DNA van een vrouw uit de steentijd gevonden Wetenschappers zeggen dat het de eerste keer is dat genetisch materiaal is gebruikt om de drager van een oud voorwerp te vinden
Translated Text: DNA of stone age woman found on twenty thousand years old jewelry On a about twenty thousand years old jewelry DNA of a stone age woman was found Scientists say it's the first time that genetic material has been used to find the carrier of an old object

Original Text: NASA brengt in beeld hoe ongelooflijk groot zwarte gaten kunnen worden NASA heeft een nieuwe video gepubliceerd waarin ze uitlegt hoe groot zwarte gaten kunnen worden De video is onderdeel van Black Hole Week zwartegatweek waarin de Amerikaanse ruimteorganisatie aandacht schenkt aan het spectaculaire kosmische fenomeen
Translated Text: NASA shows how incredibly big black holes can be NASA has published a new video explaining how big black holes can be The video is part of Black Hole Week black hole week in which the American space organization pays attention to the spectacular cosmic phenomenon

Original Text: Urn uit vroege middeleeuwen opgegraven in Utrechts dorp Amerongen In het Utrechtse Amerongen is bij graafwerkzaamheden een urn gevonden Volgens archeologen dateert het object uit de vijfde zesde of zevende eeuw na Christus oftewel het begin van de middeleeuwen De gemeente denkt dat de urn deel uitmaakt van een nog niet volledig ontdekt grafveld
Translated Text: Urn from the early Middle Ages excavated in Utrecht's village Amerongen In Utrecht's Amerongen, an urn was found during excavation. According to archaeologists, the object dates back to the fifth sixth or seventh century AD, or the beginning of the Middle Ages.

Original Text: Astronomen zien voor het eerst hoe een kosmische jet aan een zwart gat ontsnapt Astronomen hebben in een reusachtig sterrenstelsel ver van de aarde een opvallend verschijnsel gezien Voor het eerst is een zogeheten kosmische jet bij een zwart gat op beeld vastgelegd meldt The Guardian
Translated Text: Astronomers see for the first time how a cosmic jet escapes a black hole Astronomers have seen a striking phenomenon in a giant galaxy far from Earth For the first time, a so-called cosmic jet at a black hole has been captured on image, reports The Guardian

Original Text: Papegaaien die leerden videobellen voelen zich minder eenzaam Papegaaien die geleerd hebben om met elkaar te videobellen zijn minder eenzaam Ze zingen en spelen meer dan vogels die alleen leven blijkt vrijdag uit Amerikaans onderzoek
Translated Text: Parrots who learned video bells feel less lonely Parrots who have learned to call each other video are less lonely They sing and play more than birds who live alone, according to American research Friday

Original Text: Archeologen vinden resten van Mayamensenoffers onder piramide in Mexico In een Mayaruïne in het zuidoosten van Mexico zijn botresten gevonden van ten minste 25 geofferde mensen Onderzoekers hebben schedels kaakfragmenten en andere delen van botten ontdekt van voornamelijk jonge mannen
Translated Text: Archaeologists find remains of Maya human sacrifice under pyramid in Mexico In a Mayaruin in southeast Mexico, bone remains of at least 25 people sacrificed Researchers have discovered skulls jaw fragments and other parts of bones of mainly young men

Original Text: Vikingen verlieten Groenland onder meer vanwege zeespiegelstijging van 3 meter Vikingen die eeuwenlang in Groenland leefden werden in de vijftiende eeuw verdreven door een zeespiegelstijging van zeker 3 meter Eerder werd gedacht dat de Noormannen vertrokken vanwege de kou maar dat is nu ontkracht
Translated Text: Vikings left Greenland, among other things, due to sea level rise of 3 meters Vikings who lived in Greenland for centuries in the fifteenth century were driven away by a sea level rise of at least 3 meters Earlier it was thought that the Normans left because of the cold but that's now out of control.

Original Text: Zangvogels doen stemoefeningen om niet vals te zingen en om partner te scoren Als zangvogels willen voorkomen dat ze vals gaan zingen moeten ze elke dag hun toonladders oefenen En het is niet geheel onbelangrijk om toon te houden want loepzuivere zangprestaties zorgen er ook nog eens voor dat ze indruk kunnen maken op een mogelijke partner
Translated Text: Vocals do vocal exercises to avoid singing falsely and to score partner If songbirds want to prevent them from singing falsely, they have to practice their scales every day and it's not entirely unimportant to keep a tone because flawless vocal performance also ensures that they can impress a possible partner

Original Text: Voor 5 miljoen euro geveilde T rex verdwijnt waarschijnlijk achter slot en grendel Voor het eerst is er in Europa een skelet van een tyrannosaurus rex geveild De dinosaurus verwisselde dinsdag voor bijna 5 miljoen euro van eigenaar Wetenschappers vrezen dat het skelet naar een privécollectie verhuist
Translated Text: For 5 million euros of auctioned T rex probably disappears under lock and key For the first time in Europe there is a skeleton of a tyrannosaurus rex auctioned The dinosaur changed Tuesday for almost 5 million euros from owner Scientists fear that the skeleton will move to a private collection

Original Text: Nederlandse onderzoekers blazen zeebodem in Kenia nieuw leven in met kunstrif Nederlandse onderzoekers hebben in ZuidoostKenia een koraalrif aangelegd met onder meer voorgekweekt koraal En dat project blijkt een succes Op de zeebodem zijn inmiddels meer vissen en meer nieuw koraal aanwezig
Translated Text: Dutch researchers breathe new life into the sea floor in Kenya with art reef Dutch researchers have created a coral reef in ZuidoostKenia with, among other things, prebred coral And that project proves to be a success More fish and more new coral are now present on the sea floor

Original Text: Luxueuze Romeinse wijnmakerij gevonden tijdens opgravingen bij Rome Nieuwe opgravingen nabij Rome laten zien dat rijke Romeinen in nog meer luxe en weelde leefden dan gedacht Bij de ruïnes van Villa dei Quintili ten zuidoosten van de Italiaanse hoofdstad is een uitgebreide wijnmakerij gevonden
Translated Text: Luxurious Roman winery found during excavations near Rome New excavations near Rome show that rich Romans lived in even more luxury and wealth than thought In the ruins of Villa dei Quintili southeast of the Italian capital an extensive winery has been found

Original Text: Archeologen vinden twaalfhonderd jaar oud stenen scorebord voor Mayabalspel Archeologen hebben in Mexico een steen gevonden die waarschijnlijk diende als scorebord voor een balspel van de oude Mayas Door de vondst komen wetenschappers meer te weten over hoe het MiddenAmerikaanse volk zich vermaakte
Translated Text: Archaeologists find twelve hundred years old stone scoreboard for Maya Ball Game Archaeologists have found a stone in Mexico that probably served as a scoreboard for a ball game by the old Mayas Scientists learn more about how the Central American people enjoyed themselves

Original Text: Leidse archeologen vinden graftombe van 3200 jaar oud in Egypte Leidse archeologen hebben samen met collegas uit Egypte en Italië een 3200 jaar oude tombe ontdekt in de Egyptische dodenstad Sakkara Het graf komt uit de tijd van de beroemde farao Ramses II die stierf in 1213 voor Christus
Translated Text: Leiden archaeologists find tomb of 3200 years old in Egypt Leiden archaeologists together with colleagues from Egypt and Italy have discovered a 3200 year old tomb in the Egyptian city of death Sakkara The tomb comes from the time of the famous Pharaoh Ramses II who died in 1213 BC

Original Text: Massauitsterving duurde niet een paar jaar maar 3 miljoen jaar Een massauitsterving van zon 260 miljoen jaar geleden blijkt niet uit één maar uit twee rampen te hebben bestaan Wetenschappers hebben nu ontdekt dat tussen beide gebeurtenissen een kleine drie miljoen jaar zat
Translated Text: Mass extinction didn't last a few years but 3 million years A mass extinction of the Sun 260 million years ago appears to have consisted not of one but of two disasters Scientists have now discovered that between the two events was a little over three million years.

Original Text: Is er leven rondom Jupiter Sonde begint aan jarenlange eenzame zoektocht Jupiter de grootste planeet in ons zonnestelsel krijgt bezoek Een ruimtesonde gaat onderzoeken of er leven mogelijk is op drie manen die rond Jupiter draaien
Translated Text: Is there life around Jupiter Sonde beginning years of lonely quest Jupiter the largest planet in our solar system gets visit A space probe is going to investigate whether life is possible on three moons spinning around Jupiter

Original Text: Mensen in Spanje gebruikten 3000 jaar geleden al hallucinerende drugs Mensen in Spanje gebruikten zon drieduizend jaar geleden al geestverruimende middelen Het is het eerste directe bewijs van drugsgebruik in de bronstijd in Europa Dat blijkt uit een nieuwe studie die donderdag is gepubliceerd in het wetenschappelijke tijdschrift Scientific Reports
Translated Text: People in Spain already used hallucinating drugs 3000 years ago People in Spain used mind-expanding drugs three thousand years ago It's the first direct evidence of drug use in the bronze age in Europe That's evident from a new study published in the scientific journal Scientific Reports on Thursday.

Original Text: Pluizige bol uit Canada blijkt 30000 jaar oude eekhoorn te zijn Een in Canada opgegraven pluizige bol blijkt een 30000 jaar oude eekhoorn te zijn Onderzoekers denken dat het diertje tijdens zijn winterslaap is gestorven
Translated Text: Fluffy sphere from Canada turns out to be 30000 year old squirrel An excavated fluffy sphere in Canada turns out to be a 30000 year old squirrel Researchers think the animal died in hibernation

Original Text: Tijgers kunnen net als mensen extrovert of introvert zijn blijkt uit studie Onder tijgers heb je net als bij mensen extroverte en introverte types Dit blijkt uit een nieuwe studie Deze bevindingen kunnen volgens de onderzoekers bijdragen aan meer kennis over tijgers en het beschermen van de bedreigde diersoort
Translated Text: Tiger can be extrovert or introvert just like humans, according to study Among tigers, you have extrovert and introvert types as in humans.This is shown by a new study.These findings can contribute to more knowledge about tigers and the protection of the endangered species.

Original Text: James Webbtelescoop legt planeet Uranus als om door een ringetje te halen vast De James Webbruimtetelescoop heeft de planeet Uranus op prachtige wijze vastgelegd Op de foto zijn de ringen van de planeet in detail zichtbaar Ook een van haar poolkappen en een atmosfeer met daarin zelfs wolken zijn te zien
Translated Text: James Webb telescope lays planet Uranus as if to pull through a ring The James Webb space telescope has beautifully captured the planet Uranus The photo shows the rings of the planet in detail Also one of its polar caps and an atmosphere with even clouds in it can be seen.

Original Text: Wilde olifanten lijken zichzelf te hebben getemd zonder invloed van de mens Afrikaanse olifanten hebben mogelijk zichzelf getemd zonder dat de mens daar een rol in heeft gespeeld Een team van Duitse Amerikaanse en Spaanse wetenschappers zegt dat het onderlinge gedrag van de dieren lijkt op dat van mensen en bonobos
Translated Text: Wild elephants seem to have tamed themselves without human influence African elephants may have tamed themselves without human involvement A team of German American and Spanish scientists says that the animal's behaviour is similar to that of humans and bonobos

Original Text: Nooit eerder zagen wetenschappers een vis zó diep onder water zwemmen Een team van Japanse en Australische wetenschappers heeft een vis gefilmd op precies 8336 meter diepte Nooit eerder werd een vis gezien die zo diep zwom Volgens hoofdonderzoeker Alan Jamieson is met de ontdekking aangetoond dat vissen nog dieper kunnen leven dan we tot nu toe dachten
Translated Text: Never before have scientists seen a fish swim so deep underwater A team of Japanese and Australian scientists filmed a fish at exactly 8336 meters depth Never before has a fish swim so deep Alan Jamieson has discovered that fish can live even deeper than we thought so far.

Original Text: Tyrannosaurus rex had volgens nieuwe studie waarschijnlijk hagedisachtige lippen De vlijmscherpe hoektanden van de tyrannosaurus rex waren helemaal niet zo goed zichtbaar als in de film Jurassic Park In plaats daarvan lag het angstaanjagende gebit van de koning van de dinos verborgen achter geschubde lippen beweren wetenschappers in een nieuwe studie
Translated Text: Tyrannosaurus rex had according to new study probably lizardish lips The razor sharp fangs of the tyrannosaurus rex were not at all as visible as in the movie Jurassic Park Instead, the frightening teeth of the king of the dinosaurs were hidden behind scaly lips claim scientists in a new study

Original Text: Wetenschappers staan versteld van platste explosie in de ruimte ooit Wetenschappers hebben op 180 miljoen lichtjaar van de aarde een bijzonder fenomeen waargenomen Het gaat om een zeldzame explosie die net zo groot is als ons zonnestelsel Die gaat de boeken in als de platste explosie die tot dusver in de ruimte is gezien Het verschijnsel roept de nodige vragen op
Translated Text: Scientists are amazed at the flattest explosion in space ever Scientists have observed a particular phenomenon at 180 million light-years from Earth. It is a rare explosion that is as large as our solar system. It enters the books as the flattest explosion seen in space so far. The phenomenon raises the necessary questions.

Original Text: Vrouwtjesspin stelt mannetje voor het paren gerust door te doen alsof ze dood is Vrouwelijke trechterspinnen doen zich als dood voor als ze met een mannetjesspin willen paren Zo willen ze het mannetje op zijn gemak stellen De vrouwelijke trechterspin is namelijk ook in staat om haar paringspartner op te eten na de daad schrijven de onderzoekers in Current Zoology
Translated Text: Woman's spider suggests male for mating by pretending to be dead Female funnel spider pretends to be dead if they want to mate with a male spider So they want to make the male at ease The female funnel spider is also able to eat her mating partner after the deed write the researchers in Current Zoology

Original Text: Astronomen vinden dankzij zwaartekrachtlens een van grootste zwarte gaten ooit Sterrenkundigen hebben dankzij een zwaartekrachtlens een van de grootste zwarte gaten ooit ontdekt De massa van het zwarte gat is 30 miljard keer zo groot als die van onze zon Het zwarte gat is honderden miljoenen lichtjaren verwijderd van de aarde
Translated Text: Astronomers find thanks to gravity lens one of the largest black holes ever astronomers have discovered thanks to a gravity lens one of the largest black holes ever discovered The mass of the black hole is 30 billion times greater than that of our sun The black hole is hundreds of millions of light years away from Earth

Original Text: Mediavrouw Linda Yaccarino gaat Elon Musk opvolgen als baas van Twitter Linda Yaccarino wordt de nieuwe baas van Twitter heeft Elon Musk vrijdag aangekondigd Yaccarino is groot geworden in de wereld van de tvreclame en werkte hiervoor bij mediabedrijf NBC Universal Samen met haar gaat Musk werken aan X  de allesapp
Translated Text: Mediawoman Linda Yaccarino is going to succeed Elon Musk as boss of Twitter Linda Yaccarino becomes the new boss of Twitter Elon Musk announced Friday Yaccarino has grown up in the world of TV advertising and worked for this at media company NBC Universal Together with her, Musk will work on X's all-app

Original Text: Europeanen moeten nog even wachten op Googles AIchatbot Bard Bard de ChatGPTconcurrent van Google komt voorlopig nog niet naar Europa Deze week kondigde het bedrijf aan dat Bard in 180 landen beschikbaar zal komen maar daar zaten nog geen Europese landen bij Op termijn brengt Google Bard wel uit in Europa belooft topman Sundar Pichai
Translated Text: Europeans still have to wait for Google's Aichatbot Bard Bard Google's ChatGPT competitor to come to Europe for the time being This week the company announced that Bard will be available in 180 countries but there were no European countries yet In the long run Google Bard will release in Europe promises top man Sundar Pichai

Original Text: Storing bij ING is voorbij betalen via de app is weer mogelijk De problemen waardoor INGklanten vrijdagmiddag niet konden inloggen zijn inmiddels verholpen Ze kunnen nu weer bij Mijn ING inloggen en geld overmaken
Translated Text: Failure at ING is over payment via the app is again possible The problems that ING customers could not log in on Friday afternoon have been resolved They can now log in and transfer money to My ING again

Original Text: Elon Musk zegt dat hij nieuwe topvrouw voor Twitter heeft gevonden Elon Musk zegt dat hij een vervanger voor zichzelf heeft gevonden als hoogste baas bij Twitter De miljardair blijft zelf als voorzitter en eindverantwoordelijke voor technologie werkzaam in het bestuur van het bedrijf
Translated Text: Elon Musk says he's found new top woman for Twitter Elon Musk says he's found a replacement for himself as the top boss at Twitter The billionaire himself remains the chairman and final manager of technology in the company's management

Original Text: Pornosite xHamster gaat in beroep in zaak over illegale amateurbeelden Pornosite xHamster gaat in beroep tegen de uitspraak over illegale naaktbeelden Dat bevestigt de advocaat van xHamster tegenover NUnl De rechtbank van Amsterdam bepaalde een maand geleden dat de website alle videos moet verwijderen waarvoor ze geen aantoonbare toestemming heeft gekregen
Translated Text: Pornosite xHamster appeals in case of illegal amateur images Pornosite xHamster appeals against the ruling on illegal nude images That confirms the lawyer of xHamster against NUnl The Amsterdam Court ruled one month ago that the website should delete all videos for which it has not been granted a demonstrable consent

Original Text: Britse waakhond verbiedt Microsoft en Activision om elkaars aandelen te kopen Microsoft en Call of Dutymaker Activision Blizzard mogen geen aandelen van elkaar kopen zolang het beroep tegen het overnameverbod in behandeling is Dat heeft de Britse toezichthouder CMA donderdag bepaald De softwaregigant wil de gameontwikkelaar overnemen voor 69 miljard dollar 633 miljard euro
Translated Text: British watchdog forbids Microsoft and Activision to buy each other's shares Microsoft and Call of Dutymaker Activision Blizzard may not buy shares from each other as long as the appeal against the acquisition ban is pending That's what the British supervisor CMA decided Thursday The software giant wants to take over the game developer for 69 billion dollars 633 billion euros

Original Text: Alweer een storing bij ING betalingen via app niet mogelijk Het is voor de zoveelste keer in een paar maanden mis bij ING Klanten melden problemen met de app waardoor ze niet kunnen inloggen of geld kunnen overmaken De bank erkent dat er problemen zijn
Translated Text: Another failure with ING payments via app not possible It is wrong with ING Customers for the umpteenth time in a few months report problems with the app that prevent them from logging in or transferring money The bank acknowledges that there are problems

Original Text: AIwet haalt grote meerderheid bij eerste stemming Europees Parlement Het Europees Parlement heeft donderdag voor het eerst gestemd over de aanstaande AIwet Het voorstel is door een grote meerderheid goedgekeurd Toch duurt het nog een tijdje voordat de Europese regels in werking treden
Translated Text: AIwet reaches a large majority by first vote European Parliament The European Parliament voted for the first time on the upcoming AIwet The proposal was approved by a large majority However, it is still a while before the European rules come into force

Original Text: 22 miljoen Nederlanders werden vorig jaar slachtoffer van online criminaliteit Vorig jaar zijn 22 miljoen Nederlanders het slachtoffer geworden van online criminaliteit meldt Statistiekbureau CBS donderdag Oplichting en fraude kwamen het vaakst voor Maar er werden ook veel mensen het slachtoffer van hacken bedreiging en intimidatie
Translated Text: 22 million Dutch people were victims of online crime last year 22 million Dutch people were victims of online crime reports Statistics Office CBS Thursday Scam and fraud were the most common but many people were also victims of hacking threat and intimidation

Original Text: Voor het eerst een vouwbare telefoon van Google de Pixel Fold Google heeft woensdag voor het eerst een eigen vouwbare telefoon gepresenteerd De Pixel Fold vouwt open als een boek en kost 1899 euro Ook de smartphone Pixel 7a werd gepresenteerd
Translated Text: For the first time a folding phone from Google the Pixel Fold Google has presented its own folding phone for the first time Wednesday The Pixel Fold folds open as a book and costs 1899 euro Also the smartphone Pixel 7a was presented

Original Text: Google kondigt grootse plannen aan voor AI in de zoekmachine Google heeft woensdag eindelijk bekendgemaakt welke plannen het bedrijf heeft met kunstmatige intelligentie AI Zo komen er grote veranderingen voor de zoekmachine wordt de chatbot Bard beschikbaar voor iedereen en krijgen bestaande diensten zoals Gmail en Maps nieuwe AIfuncties
Translated Text: Google announces grand plans for AI in the search engine Google has finally announced on Wednesday what plans the company has with artificial intelligence AI So there will be major changes for the search engine the chatbot Bard becomes available to everyone and get existing services such as Gmail and Maps new AI features

Original Text: Stapje dichter bij Europese AIwet akkoord komt pas in 2024 Hoe houden we kunstmatige intelligentie AI onder controle In Brussel wordt al twee jaar gewerkt aan regels die het gebruik van AI in goede banen moeten leiden Maar het duurt nog even voordat de richtlijnen er zijn terwijl de ontwikkelingen elkaar in rap tempo opvolgen
Translated Text: Step closer to European AI Act agreement only comes in 2024 How do we keep artificial intelligence AI under control In Brussels, we have been working for two years on rules to manage the use of AI but it takes a while before the guidelines are in place while developments are following each other at a rapid pace.

Original Text: Aantal aangetroffen websites met ernstig kindermisbruik in twee jaar verdubbeld Onderzoekers hebben vorig jaar 51369 websites met de ernstigste vorm van kindermisbruik gevonden Dat is een verdubbeling in vergelijking met 2020 Bijna een derde van deze websites staat op Nederlandse servers
Translated Text: Number of websites with serious child abuse doubled in two years Researchers found 51369 websites with the most serious form of child abuse last year That's a doubling compared to 2020 Almost a third of these websites are on Dutch servers

Original Text: Britse man bekent rol bij grote hack bij Twitter en riskeert tientallen jaren cel Een Britse hacker heeft toegegeven dat hij in juli 2020 betrokken was bij het inbreken in de systemen achter Twitter Daardoor konden hij en enkele handlangers meerdere accounts overnemen Onder anderen politicus Geert Wilders was daar de dupe van
Translated Text: British man confessed to being a major hack at Twitter and risked decades of prison A British hacker admitted that he was involved in breaking into the systems behind Twitter in July 2020, allowing him and some accomplices to take over multiple accounts.

Original Text: Woningbouwvereniging betaalt losgeld aan cybercriminelen na aanval Woonkracht10 heeft cybercriminelen losgeld betaald na een aanval die eind april plaatsvond De Zwijndrechtse woningcorporatie heeft afspraken gemaakt met de aanvallers om te zorgen dat ze gestolen data verwijderen
Translated Text: House building association pays ransom to cybercriminals after attack Housing power10 has paid cybercriminals ransom after an attack that took place at the end of April The Zwijndrecht housing corporation has made agreements with the attackers to make sure they delete stolen data

Original Text: Nintendo Switch lijkt over hoogtepunt heen vijfde minder spelcomputers verkocht Nintendo verkocht in het afgelopen jaar bijna achttien miljoen Switchspelcomputers Dat zijn er 22 procent minder dan een jaar eerder Eerder wees Nintendo op chiptekorten maar ook de populariteit van de Switch is tanende
Translated Text: Nintendo Switch seems to have peaked fifth less game consoles sold Nintendo sold in the past year almost 18 million Switch game computers That are 22 percent less than a year earlier Earlier Nintendo pointed to chip shortages but also the popularity of the Switch is waning

Original Text: Twitter houdt grote schoonmaak duizenden slapende accounts gaan verdwijnen Twitter gaat accounts die al meerdere jaren niet zijn gebruikt opruimen Door deze maatregel zullen veel twitteraars volgers kwijtraken
Translated Text: Twitter keeps big cleaning thousands of sleeping accounts going to disappear Twitter is going to clean up accounts that haven't been used for several years Because of this measure, many tweeters will lose followers

Original Text: LinkedIn stuurt ruim zevenhonderd medewerkers de laan uit LinkedIn gaat 716 banen schrappen Dat komt neer op 35 procent van het totale personeelsbestand Het zakelijke sociale netwerk verwacht een zwakkere economische groei en wil daarom kosten besparen
Translated Text: LinkedIn sends over seven hundred employees out of LinkedIn is going to cut 716 jobs That amounts to 35 percent of the total workforce The business social network expects weaker economic growth and therefore wants to save costs

Original Text: Dat spionagesoftware in Europa wordt misbruikt is wel duidelijk nu nog ingrijpen Het illegale gebruik van spionagesoftware is een wezenlijk en zorgwekkend Europees probleem Het Europees Parlement komt daarom met aanbevelingen om daar iets aan te doen Het onderzoek is klaar zegt D66Europarlementariër Sophie in t Veld Maar het werk van dit Parlement nog niet
Translated Text: That espionage software is being abused in Europe is clearly still taking action now The illegal use of espionage software is a fundamental and worrying European problem The European Parliament is therefore coming up with recommendations to do something about it The study is ready, says D66 MEP Sophie in t Veld But the work of this Parliament is not yet done.

Original Text: Rechtszaak tussen Google en Sonos sleept zich in slakkengang voort Luidsprekerproducent Sonos en techgigant Google staan maandag weer tegenover elkaar in de rechtszaal in San Francisco Het is een nieuw hoofdstuk in het al jaren slepende juridische conflict tussen de twee bedrijven Sonos eist een schadevergoeding van 90 miljoen dollar 815 miljoen euro
Translated Text: Lawsuits between Google and Sonos drag themselves into slugs through Loudspeaker producer Sonos and tech giant Google face again on Monday in the San Francisco courtroom It's a new chapter in the long-standing legal conflict between the two companies Sonos demands compensation of 90 million dollars 815 million euros

Original Text: Storing verholpen INGklanten kunnen weer geld overmaken naar eigen rekening ING heeft de storing waardoor klanten maandagochtend geen geld konden overmaken naar eigen bankrekeningen inmiddels verholpen Door een storing waren niet alle rekeningen zichtbaar in internetbankieren en de INGapp
Translated Text: Failure corrected ING customers can transfer money back to their own account ING has corrected the malfunction that prevented customers from transferring money to their own bank accounts Monday morning Due to a malfunction not all accounts were visible in internet banking and the INGapp

Original Text: Harry Potterspel Hogwarts Legacy levert ruim 1 miljard dollar op Hogwarts Legacy is de bestverkopende game die Warner Bros Games ooit heeft uitgebracht Sinds 10 februari is het Harry Potterspel al meer dan vijftien miljoen keer verkocht De spelontwikkelaar meldt dat de game al meer dan 1 miljard dollar ruim 905 miljoen euro heeft opgeleverd
Translated Text: Harry Potterspel Hogwarts Legacy delivers over $1 billion on Hogwarts Legacy is the best-selling game Warner Bros Games has ever released Since February 10th, the Harry Potter game has been sold more than 15 million times The game developer reports that the game has already delivered more than $1 billion over €905 million.

Original Text: NU  Internetkabels in Noordzee doelwit van sabotage hoe kwetsbaar zijn we De bodem van de Noordzee ligt vol met internetkabels Rond die kabels zijn de laatste tijd verdachte Russische schepen gesignaleerd die ons internet zouden willen saboteren Moeten we bang zijn dat ons internet uitvalt
Translated Text: NOW Internet cables in the North Sea target of sabotage how vulnerable we are The bottom of the North Sea is full of internet cables Around these cables have recently been detected suspicious Russian ships that would want to sabotage our Internet Should we be afraid that our internet will fail?

Original Text: NU  AI kan revolutie in kankerzorg ontketenen maar in hoeverre willen we dat Kunstmatige intelligentie AI kan veel meer dan alleen teksten schrijven en liedjes maken Zo kunnen AIalgoritmes getraind worden om in een vroeg stadium kanker te ontdekken Maar durven we wel blind te vertrouwen op de waarnemingen van een computer die een radioloog niet met het blote oog kan zien
Translated Text: NOW AI can unleash revolution in cancer care but to what extent do we want that Artificial Intelligence AI can write much more than just writing lyrics and making songs So AI algorithms can be trained to detect cancer at an early stage But we dare to rely blindly on the observations of a computer that a radiologist cannot see with the naked eye

Original Text: Witte Huis wijst techbedrijven op hun morele plicht om AI veilig te houden Techbedrijven hebben de morele plicht om ervoor te zorgen dat systemen voor kunstmatige intelligentie AI veilig zijn vindt de Amerikaanse vicepresident Kamala Harris
Translated Text: White House reminds tech companies of their moral duty to keep AI safe Tech companies have a moral duty to ensure that systems for artificial intelligence AI are safe according to U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris

Original Text: Duurdere iPhone beperkt omzetdaling van Apple Apple heeft in het afgelopen kwartaal minder omzet gedraaid dan in dezelfde periode vorig jaar Er gingen minder computers en tablets over de toonbank Het bedrijf verdiende wel meer geld aan de verkoop van iPhones en diensten zoals de verkoop van apps in de App Store
Translated Text: More expensive iPhone limited sales decline of Apple Apple has run less sales in the last quarter than in the same period last year There were fewer computers and tablets across the counter The company did earn more money selling iPhones and services such as app sales in the App Store

Translated Text: NOW GGDs are full but is a prick for your faraway journey at all If you booked a faraway trip then quickly arrange your travel innings because the locations of the GGD will be fully booked in the coming weeks You will need those stings before you pack your suitcase just as advice

Translated Text: The final exams have started again and that can lead to stressful periods and short nights What influences stress on sleep And how do you deal with it?

Translated Text: NOW Don't surprise your mother with flowers but with a good conversation Of course it's nice to be on Mother's Day on the doorstep with a bunch of flowers But don't do your mother a greater pleasure with a good conversation Finding these relationship experts of well Search that tension on Almost everyone needs more connection

Original Text: NU  Experts in de gezondheidszorg over homeopathie Bedrog in een potje Onlangs protesteerde de Vereniging tegen de Kwakzalverij tegen homeopathie Om duidelijk te maken dat deze middelen niks doen namen leden van die vereniging een overdosis aan homeopathische pillen in Wat zijn homeopathische middelen en hoe risicovol is het slikken ervan

Original Text: Geen treinverkeer tussen Aat en Doornik Er rijden geen treinen tussen Aat en Doornik in beide richtingen na een aanrijding van een persoon in het station van LeuzeenHainaut Dat laat spoorwegnetbeheerder Infrabel dinsdagnamiddag weten
Translated Text: No train traffic between Aat and Tournai There are no trains between Aat and Tournai in either direction after a collision of a person in the station of LeuzeenHainaut That informs railway operator Infrabel Tuesday afternoon

Original Text: Uitbraak apenpokken is volgens WHO niet langer een internationale noodsituatie De wereldwijde uitbraak van apenpokken is volgens wereldgezondheidsorganisatie WHO niet langer een internationale noodsituatie Volgens WHOtopman Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus wordt er gestage vooruitgang geboekt bij het beheersen van de uitbraak
Translated Text: According to WHO, the outbreak of monkey pox is no longer an international emergency The global outbreak of monkey pox is no longer an international emergency according to World Health Organisation WHO. According to WHOtopman Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, steady progress is being made in controlling the outbreak.

Original Text: NU  Waarom schond GGZ Drenthe beroepsgeheim voor verdachte patiënt In april hield de politie een man aan die als verpleegkundige op de longafdeling van een Drents ziekenhuis verdacht wordt van betrokkenheid bij de dood van zon twintig patiënten De zaak kwam aan het rollen doordat de GGZ Drenthe haar beroepsgeheim schond Hoe uitzonderlijk is het dat een zorgorganisatie de geheimhoudingsplicht schendt
Translated Text: NOW Why did GGZ violate Drenthe's professional secrecy for suspicious patient In April, the police arrested a man who, as a nurse in the lung ward of a Drenents hospital, was suspected of being involved in the death of 20 patients The case came to a roll because the GGZ Drenthe violated her professional secrecy How exceptional is it that a care organisation violates confidentiality

Original Text: Minister Kuipers ziet niks in landelijke registratie van patiënten met postcovid Minister Ernst Kuipers Volksgezondheid is tegen een landelijke registratie van mensen met postcovid De bewindsman acht dat moeilijk omdat er niet duidelijk is hoeveel mensen echt last hebben van langdurige klachten na een coronabesmetting
Translated Text: Minister Kuipers does not see anything in national registration of patients with postcovid Minister Ernst Kuipers Public Health is against a national registration of people with postcovid The regime considers that difficult because there is not clear how many people really suffer from long-term complaints after a corona infection

Original Text: Weer baby geboren met drie biologische ouders door revolutionaire behandeling In het Verenigd Koninkrijk is opnieuw een baby geboren die drie biologische ouders heeft De revolutionaire behandeling is wereldwijd nog geen vijf keer toegepast Het is de eerste keer dat die plaatsvindt in een Brits ziekenhuis
Translated Text: Baby again born with three biological parents through revolutionary treatment In the UK another baby has been born who has three biological parents The revolutionary treatment has not been applied five times worldwide It is the first time it takes place in a British hospital

Original Text: Moeder en babysterfte in de wereld neemt maar niet af volgens WHO De moeder en babysterfte in de wereld neemt maar niet af Dat komt doordat er steeds minder geld gaat naar de gezondheid van moeders en pasgeborenen De overlevingskansen bij de bevalling zijn al sinds 2015 ongeveer hetzelfde

Original Text: Sudan Reports of women being raped in Khartoum by armed men Refugees are among those receiving support since civil war broke out last month  and officials believes more sexual assault cases are going unreportedThere have been multiple reports of civilians being raped by armed men in the Sudanese capital of Khartoum where fighting broke out last month say government officialsFour women and a girl three of them refugees are being supported by a specialist unit whose director said she thought most of the sexual violence in the city was going unreported Continue reading

Original Text: Nigerian musician Seun Kuti arrested for allegedly assaulting police officer Son of Afrobeat legend Fela Kuti arrested after he was shown on video shouting and apparently smacking an officer police sayThe Nigerian musician Seun Kuti son of Afrobeat legend Fela Kuti was arrested for allegedly assaulting a police officer Lagos state police said on MondayAn order was made for the arrest of Kuti a Grammynominated saxophonist and singer on Saturday after a viral video showed him on a road shouting and apparently pushing and smacking a police officer police said Continue reading

Original Text: Recreate UKs Homes for Ukraine scheme for Sudan refugees urges one of plans architects Exclusive Krish Kandiah wants same help given to Ukrainians offered to Sudanese families fleeing civil warUK politics live  latest updatesRussiaUkraine war  latest news updatesOne of the architects of Britains Homes for Ukraine scheme is calling on the government to replicate the programme for refugees from SudanDr Krish Kandiah the director of the Sanctuary Foundation which was instrumental in matching many British hosts with Ukrainian refugees said he wanted the country to show the same generosity of spirit to those fleeing war in Sudan as it did to Ukrainians Continue reading

Original Text: South Africa summons US ambassador over his claims it is arming Russia Foreign ministry says there is no record of approved arms sale after allegations by Reuben BrigetySouth Africas foreign ministry has summoned the US ambassador over allegations he made that the country had provided arms and ammunition to Russia for its war in UkraineAmid the diplomatic fallout South Africas foreign minister Naledi Pandor would also speak with the US secretary of state Antony Blinken South Africas Department of International Relations and Cooperation said in a statement posted on Twitter Continue reading

Original Text: Weather tracker flash floods and landslides hit parts of east Africa Many reported dead in Rwanda and Uganda as heavy rain also devastates western regions of continentMay is the end of the rainy season for many parts of east Africa However this does not mean the devastation has endedLast week heavy rainfall which started in the late afternoon on 2 May led to flash flooding in parts of Rwanda and Uganda These heavy downpours continued through to 4 May with further wet weather following later in the week Continue reading

Original Text: Diabetics fleeing Sudan struggle to keep their insulin safe in 40C heat With makeshift coolbags and an endless quest for ice refugees are desperately struggling to protect their precious medication  if they can access any at allBags of ice and wet towels have become the emergency lifelines for Sudanese diabetics struggling to keep their insulin cool while waiting in extreme heat as they try to escape the recent violenceA vital medication for many diabetics insulin must be kept cool to remain effective But since fighting broke out between the Sudanese army and paramilitary Rapid Support Forces last month hospitals and pharmacies have forced to close and there has been damage to coldstorage facilities Continue reading

Original Text: Weather tracker Cyclone Mocha batters Bangladesh and Myanmar Refugee camps bear brunt of deadly category5 storm while temperature divide is expected in North AmericaCyclone Mocha brought strong winds and torrential rain to parts of Bangladesh and Myanmar on Sunday with refugee camps bearing the brunt of the category5 storm leaving at least five dead and causing half a million people to be evacuatedThe region was rocked by sustained winds of more than 160mph as Mocha made landfall whipping up gusts closer to 200mph and a storm surge of up to 4 metres The worlds largest refugee camp Coxs Bazar was badly hit and more than 1300 shelters were destroyed Heavy rain triggered landslides and floods Continue reading
Translated Text: Weather tracker Cyclone Mocha batters Bangladesh and Myanmar Refugee camps bear brunt of deadly category5 storm while temperature divide is expected in North AmericaCyclone Mocha brought strong winds and torrential rain to parts of Bangladesh and Myanmar on Sunday with refugee camps bearing the brunt of the category5 storm leaving at least five dead and causing half a million people to be evacuatedThe region was rocked by sustained winds of more than 160mph as Mocha made landfall whipping up gusts closer to 200mph and a storm surge of up to 4 metres The worlds largest refugee camp Coxs Bazar was badly hit and more than 1300 shelters were destroyed Heavy rain triggered landslides and floods Continue reading

Original Text: Vice files for bankruptcy protection amid cutprice sale to consortium Digital publisher and owner of Vice News and Vice TV was once valued at 6bn but has agreed sale for 225mVice the once highflying media startup that reached a peak valuation of nearly 6bn 5bn has filed for bankruptcy protection in the US as the digital publisher engineers a cutprice sale to a group of lendersThe company whose assets include Vice News Motherboard Refinery29 and Vice TV has agreed a sale to a consortium that includes Fortress Investment Group Soros Fund Management and Monroe Capital for 225m in the form of a credit bid for its assets as well as assuming Vices significant liabilities Continue reading
Translated Text: Vice files for bankruptcy protection amid cutprice sale to consortium Digital publisher and owner of Vice News and Vice TV was once valued at 6bn but has agreed sale for 225mVice the once highflying media startup that reached a peak valuation of nearly 6bn 5bn has filed for bankruptcy protection in the US as the digital publisher engineers a cutprice sale to a group of lendersThe company whose assets include Vice News Motherboard Refinery29 and Vice TV has agreed a sale to a consortium that includes Fortress Investment Group Soros Fund Management and Monroe Capital for 225m in the form of a credit bid for its assets as well as assuming Vices significant liabilities Continue reading

Original Text: US senator denounced as profoundly ignorant man over remarks on Mexico John Kennedys comments about Mexicans eating cat food came as he urged the US military to enter country to stop the cartelsMexicans would be eating cat food out of a can and living in a tent behind an Outback Steakhouse restaurant if it were not for their nations proximity to the US and their country should be invaded because of the presence of drug cartels there the US senator John Neely Kennedy has saidThe Louisiana Republicans racist remarks drew a strong condemnation from Mexicos foreign affairs secretary Marcelo Ebrard who called Kennedy a profoundly ignorant man Mexicos president Andrés Manuel López Obrador meanwhile urged the 37 million Americans of Mexican descent  along with other Latinos in the US  not to vote for people with this very arrogant very offensive and very foolish mentality in the future Continue reading

Original Text: Unaccompanied Honduran teen dies in US custody as Title 42 expires Investigators trying to determine cause for teens death which occurred in a Florida shelter on WednesdayAn unaccompanied 17yearold migrant from Honduras died in a shelter in Florida on Wednesday according to authoritiesInvestigators on Friday were still trying to determine a cause for the teens death which came as the US lifted immigration restrictions stemming from the Covid19 pandemic Continue reading

Original Text: Title 42 Biden officials press on with deportation plans and warn those crossing unlawfully face tougher consequences  as it happened Officials stress hardline approach as American Civil Liberties Union files lawsuit saying new rules close off safe routes for people seeking asylumIn El Paso the Texas city this home to one of the major crossing points from Mexico the Associated Press reports on how the citys faith leaders are navigating an influx of migrants thats expected to grow in the days to comeHeres more from their storyAs changing policies rampant misinformation and exasperated fearful crowds converge in this desert city faith leaders are striving to provide shelter and upliftAlong with prayers they are counseling migrants about the daunting challenges that await them on US soil with enormous backlogs in asylum hearings and the Biden administrations newly announced measures that many consider stricter than the existing ones known as Title 42 Continue reading

Original Text: Tiananmen Square books removed from Hong Kong libraries in runup to anniversary Publications targeted include those about protest and subjects Beijing deems politically sensitiveBooks about the Tiananmen Square massacre Hong Kong protest movements and other subjects deemed politically sensitive by Beijing have been removed from the former British colonys public libraries in the leadup to the 34th anniversary of the killingsHong Kong media have reported a marked increase in the number of book and documentary removals which have been growing since the authoritarian clampdown on Hong Kongs prodemocracy movement and the introduction of the national security law in 2020 It has resulted in a significant curtailing of political freedoms in the city and multiple arrests Continue reading

Original Text: Grin and bare it as mask mandates end Japan turns to tutors to relearn how to smile Smile education coach Keiko Kawano says more and more people have developed a complex about smilingAfter three years of concealing their mouths behind masks some Japanese people are turning to specialist smile tutors to relearn the art of breaking into a beaming grin without looking awkwardSince lifting the official advice to wear masks to help prevent the spread of Covid19 many people have admitted to struggling to adjust to life without face coverings with some confessing they have forgotten how to smile Continue reading

Original Text: US to sign pacts with Micronesia and PNG as Washington seeks to counter China in Pacific Formal signings to take place in Papua New Guinea next week when Joe Biden holds summit with Pacific leadersChinas rising influence in the Pacific explained in 30 secondsThe US is set to sign strategic pacts with Papua New Guinea and Micronesia next week as Washington seeks to shore up support among Pacific island countries to counter competition from ChinaPapua New Guineas prime minister Jamas Marape confirmed that his countrys agreements with the US would be signed when Joe Biden becomes the first sitting US president to visit the Pacific nation on 22 May Continue reading

Original Text: Thai election may be turning point as taboo over monarchy fades Campaign to reform laws that shield royal family is now part of mainstream but making it happen will be difficultThai opposition parties start alliance talksJust a few years ago talking publicly about the status or role of Thailands monarchy was taboo But on Sunday night a political party that had campaigned for reform of strict laws that shield the royal family from criticism came out on top in a general election winning the most votes and seats according to an unofficial countNapon Jatusripitak a visiting fellow at the ISEAS  Yusof Ishak Institute said it was an extremely significant moment They have the popular mandate  14 million people voted for this party And of course the party will proclaim this as a sign that Thailand has some readiness for more extensive structural reforms no matter the institution Continue reading

Original Text: Lack of affordable housing is harming regional Australia Anglicare chief says Kasy Chambers says skyrocketing rents are having flowon effects on jobs and other services such as aged careSign up for the Rural Network email newsletterJoin the Rural Network group on Facebook to be part of the communityThe 40afortnight boost to the jobseeker payment increases the number of affordable rentals across all of Australia from just four rooms in share houses to fiveThats according to the Anglicare rental affordability snapshot the Anglicare chief executive Kasy Chambers told the National Press Club on Tuesday The 2023 snapshot released before the federal budget last month analysed 46000 rental properties across Australia based on whether rent would cost more than 30 of the household budget for various lowincome householdsSign up to receive Guardian Australias fortnightly Rural Network email newsletterSign up for the Rural Network email newsletterJoin the Rural Network group on Facebook to be part of the community Continue reading

Original Text: ABC radio presenter Nicole Chvastek off air after lodging bullying claim Longtime host of Victorias regional statewide drive program is on leave pending her Fair Work Commission claim broadcaster saysFollow our Australia news live blog for the latest updatesGet our morning and afternoon news emails free app or daily news podcastThe ABC regional broadcaster Nicole Chvastek who disappeared from the airwaves several weeks ago has lodged a bullying claim against the ABC in the Fair Work CommissionAs host of Victorias regional statewide drive program for more than 11 years Chvastek has been missed by some loyal listeners who have been petitioning the ABC to bring her back The drive show reaches every regional area across Victoria southern New South Wales and eastern South AustraliaSign up for Guardian Australias free morning and afternoon email newsletters for your daily news roundup Continue reading

Original Text: Indias Congress party defeats Narendra Modis BJP in Karnataka state elections Victory deals blow to prime minister who will seek third term in power at next years general electionIndias opposition Congress party has swept the Karnataka state elections dealing a blow to Narendra Modis ruling party which had fought hard to retain powerAs votes were counted on Saturday it became clear Congress had won an overwhelming majority in the state and the ruling Bharatiya Janata party BJP quickly conceded defeat People have rejected divisive politics said Pawan Khera a Congress party spokesperson Continue reading

Original Text: RussiaUkraine war updates exceptionally intense air strikes on Kyiv overnight European leaders meet in Iceland  live Building and cars damaged by falling debris in what Kyiv officials say was an attack exceptional in its density European leaders to reaffirm support for KyivWhat we know on day 447 of the invasionThere are no encouraging prospects for extending the Black Sea grain export initiative at the moment a source familiar with the negotiations told the Russian RIA state news agency in remarks published early on Tuesday Reuters reportsUN aid chief Martin Griffiths said on Monday efforts will continue in coming days to extend a deal allowing for the safe Black Sea export of Ukrainian grain a pact Russia has threatened to quit on 18 May over obstacles to its grain and fertilizer exportsTechnicallevel discussions will continue the unidentified source told RIA but when asked about the prospects for extending the grain deal the source said that at the moment there are no encouraging prospects Continue reading

Original Text: Five men found guilty over 113m Dresden jewellery heist Men found responsible for audacious breakin at eastern German citys Green Vault museum in 2019A German court has convicted five men over the theft of 18thcentury jewels worth more than 113m from a Dresden museum in 2019They were given prison sentences of between four years and four months and six years and three months German news agency dpa reported One defendant was acquitted Continue reading

Original Text: Rishi Sunak to push for Europewide approach to illegal migration PM heads to Council of Europe meeting in Reykjavík where he also hopes to win backing for Rwanda plan from head of ECHRUK politics live  latest updatesRishi Sunak will plead with other world leaders at a summit on Tuesday for cooperation to tackle illegal migration as he seeks to reassert his authority over the restless right of his partyHe will also seek to use a rare meeting with the president of the European court of human rights ECHR to win backing for UK attempts to overcome rules that blocked the first scheduled deportation flight to Rwanda Continue reading
Translated Text: Rishi Sunak to push for Europewide approach to illegal migration PM heads to Council of Europe meeting in Reykjavík where he also hopes to win backing for Rwanda plan from head of ECHRUK politics live  latest updatesRishi Sunak will plead with other world leaders at a summit on Tuesday for cooperation to tackle illegal migration as he seeks to reassert his authority over the restless right of his partyHe will also seek to use a rare meeting with the president of the European court of human rights ECHR to win backing for UK attempts to overcome rules that blocked the first scheduled deportation flight to Rwanda Continue reading

Original Text: Ukraine Russia targets Kyiv with massive overnight airstrike Sirens sound and residents forced into bomb shelters in one of biggest attacks on capital since invasionRussiaUkraine war  latest news updatesUkraine was assessing the damage after Russian forces carried out a massive strike of exceptional intensity on Kyiv overnight in one of the biggest attacks on the capital since last years invasionEmergency sirens woke residents at 230am local time and soon afterwards there were loud booms as Ukrainian air defences engaged incoming missiles Tracer fire lit up the sky and car alarms went off There were explosions A further air raid warning sounded at 4am Continue reading
Translated Text: Ukraine Russia targets Kyiv with massive overnight airstrike Sirens sound and residents forced into bomb shelters in one of biggest attacks on capital since invasionRussiaUkraine war  latest news updatesUkraine was assessing the damage after Russian forces carried out a massive strike of exceptional intensity on Kyiv overnight in one of the biggest attacks on the capital since last years invasionEmergency sirens woke residents at 230am local time and soon afterwards there were loud booms as Ukrainian air defences engaged incoming missiles Tracer fire lit up the sky and car alarms went off There were explosions A further air raid warning sounded at 4am Continue reading

Original Text: Michael Gove joins attack on Labours proposal to extend voting rights  UK politics live Latest updates levelling up secretary writes to Keir Starmer claiming plan would downgrade privilege of British citizenshipLabour and the Liberal Democrats have called on the government to halt rocketing food prices as Rishi Sunak holds a summit with farmers and producers in Downing Street todayAnalysis by Labour of the governments statistical dataset of the average price of wholesale homegrown vegetables shows that Britishgrown tomatoes now cost 67 more than they did at the same time in 2019 In the 19th week of 2019 the average wholesale price for a kilogram of cherry tomatoes cost 179 the latest price in May 2023 stands at 3The rocketing prices also include a 109 increase for the price of a head of cauliflower a 95 increase on asparagus an 82 increase on strawberries and 62 on leeksRishi Sunaks food summit is little more than a stunt to hide years of inaction from his governmentThe Tories shambolic handling of food security has resulted in huge vegetable price increases across the countryNo ifs no buts supermarkets must cut these basic prices nowRishi Sunak needs to grow a spine and stand up for struggling families and pensioners by demanding supermarkets slash prices They have no excuses wholesale prices are down yet food prices are up with their profits soaring Continue reading
Translated Text: Michael Gove joins attack on Labours proposal to extend voting rights  UK politics live Latest updates levelling up secretary writes to Keir Starmer claiming plan would downgrade privilege of British citizenshipLabour and the Liberal Democrats have called on the government to halt rocketing food prices as Rishi Sunak holds a summit with farmers and producers in Downing Street todayAnalysis by Labour of the governments statistical dataset of the average price of wholesale homegrown vegetables shows that Britishgrown tomatoes now cost 67 more than they did at the same time in 2019 In the 19th week of 2019 the average wholesale price for a kilogram of cherry tomatoes cost 179 the latest price in May 2023 stands at 3The rocketing prices also include a 109 increase for the price of a head of cauliflower a 95 increase on asparagus an 82 increase on strawberries and 62 on leeksRishi Sunaks food summit is little more than a stunt to hide years of inaction from his governmentThe Tories shambolic handling of food security has resulted in huge vegetable price increases across the countryNo ifs no buts supermarkets must cut these basic prices nowRishi Sunak needs to grow a spine and stand up for struggling families and pensioners by demanding supermarkets slash prices They have no excuses wholesale prices are down yet food prices are up with their profits soaring Continue reading

Original Text: Flagship EU law to restore nature must not be derailed warns environment chief Rejection of key legislation on pesticides and restoration of wildlife would send a dangerous negative signal to the worldA flagship law to restore nature across Europe must be agreed by member states or risk sending a dangerous negative signal to the world the EUs environment commissioner has warned amid growing opposition to the legislationLast June the European Commission revealed proposals for legally binding targets for all member states to restore wildlife on land rivers and the sea The nature restoration law was announced alongside a separate law proposing a crackdown on chemical pesticides and both were welcomed as a milestone by environmentalists ahead of the Cop15 biodiversity summit in Montreal Continue reading
Translated Text: Flagship EU law to restore nature must not be derailed warns environment chief Rejection of key legislation on pesticides and restoration of wildlife would send a dangerous negative signal to the worldA flagship law to restore nature across Europe must be agreed by member states or risk sending a dangerous negative signal to the world the EUs environment commissioner has warned amid growing opposition to the legislationLast June the European Commission revealed proposals for legally binding targets for all member states to restore wildlife on land rivers and the sea The nature restoration law was announced alongside a separate law proposing a crackdown on chemical pesticides and both were welcomed as a milestone by environmentalists ahead of the Cop15 biodiversity summit in Montreal Continue reading

Original Text: Gaza ceasefire ends five days of fighting that left dozens dead Hostilities destroyed more than 50 homes and displaced about 950 people says the UNRelative calm has returned to the blockaded Gaza Strip after a ceasefire that has ended five days of crossfrontier fire between Israel and militant groups in the coastal enclave that killed 33 Palestinians and two people in IsraelA truce mediated by Egyptian officials that went into effect at 10pm 8pm BST on Saturday night appeared to hold despite the firing of a rocket towards southern Israel on Sunday evening that Palestinian factions said had launched due to a technical error Continue reading

Original Text: Ceasefire between Israel and Islamic Jihad in Gaza area takes effect Dozens of rockets were fired at Israel from Gaza prompting airstrikes in return in the halfhour leading up to the truceA ceasefire has taken effect in and around the Gaza Strip after five days of crossborder exchanges that have killed at least 33 Palestinians in Gaza and two people in IsraelThe truce was due to take effect at 10pm local time 2000 BST on Saturday Egyptian and Palestinian sources said But in the final 30 minutes before dozens of rockets were fired from Gaza towards Israel prompting renewed airstrikes AFP correspondents in the territory said Continue reading

Original Text: Israel and Gaza militants trade heavy fire as hopes of truce fade Outbreak of violence  now in its fourth day  has killed dozens all but one of them PalestinianIsrael and Gaza militants have traded heavy fire as hopes faded of securing a truce to end days of fighting during which dozens have been killed all but one of them PalestinianThere have been international calls for deescalation with the EU pushing for an immediate comprehensive ceasefire Continue reading

Original Text: Iran expected to execute three protesters over killing of police officers Videos released of Majid Kazemi Saeed Yaqoubi and Saleh Mirhashemi confessing which families say were tortureinducedA recent spate of executions in Iran looks set to continue after authorities released videos of three protesters confessing to the killing of three security officers in the socalled Isfahan House caseThe men have already been found guilty of the murder and have no further grounds for appeal More than 60 people have been executed in Iran since late April some for drug offences and many from the region of Balochistan where the protests have been most intense Continue reading

Original Text: Israel treats Palestinian territories like colonies says UN rapporteur Francesca Albanese says Israel is maintaining occupation to get as much land as possible for Jewish peopleIsrael treats the Palestinian territories as its colonies the UN special rapporteur on human rights in the occupied territories has said on her first visit to London since her appointment last yearFrancesca Albanese an Italian lawyer and human rights academic has faced calls to resign by Israeli government ministers such as Amichai Chikli who accused her of spewing hatred and antisemitism and Zionist groups have described her as biased Continue reading

Original Text: Afghan families in Yorkshire issued with eviction letters from Suella Braverman Refugees including a special forces soldier and a political adviser receive notice to quit letters from home secretaryAfghan refugee families uprooted from London to Yorkshire earlier this year have been issued with eviction notices in the name of Suella BravermanThis will be the fourth time that some of the families have been forced to move home sometimes leaving jobs and schools since being airlifted out of Kabul to the UK in August 2021 They were invited to the UK under Operation Pitting because at least one family member worked closely with the British authorities and it was believed that their lives would be at risk if they remained in Afghanistan Continue reading

Original Text: Cyclone Mocha three dead and 700 injured as storm pounds Myanmar About 1000 people trapped by seawater rescued amid damage to homes electricity infrastructure and mobile phone mastsRescuers have evacuated about 1000 people trapped by seawater 36 metres 12ft deep along western Myanmars coast after a powerful cyclone injured hundreds and cut off communications in one of Asias least developed countriesStrong winds injured more than 700 of about 20000 people who were sheltering in sturdier buildings on the highlands of Sittwe township such as monasteries pagodas and schools according to a leader of the Rakhine Youths Philanthropic Association in Sittwe Continue reading

Original Text: Imran Khan accuses Pakistans military of ordering his arrest Exclusive former PM claims after release from custody that army chief has personal grudge and is behind crackdown on partyPakistans former prime minister Imran Khan has escalated his criticism of the countrys powerful military accusing the head of the army of harbouring a personal grudge against him and ordering his arrest and a crackdown on his partyIt is personal Its got nothing to do with national interest Khan told the Guardian in an interview at his home in Lahore after a dramatic week in which he was arrested at Islamabads high court by almost 100 paramilitary officers on Tuesday and held in police custody in connection with a land corruption case Continue reading
Translated Text: Imran Khan accuses Pakistans military of ordering his arrest Exclusive former PM claims after release from custody that army chief has personal grudge and is behind crackdown on partyPakistans former prime minister Imran Khan has escalated his criticism of the countrys powerful military accusing the head of the army of harbouring a personal grudge against him and ordering his arrest and a crackdown on his partyIt is personal Its got nothing to do with national interest Khan told the Guardian in an interview at his home in Lahore after a dramatic week in which he was arrested at Islamabads high court by almost 100 paramilitary officers on Tuesday and held in police custody in connection with a land corruption case Continue reading

Original Text: Imran Khan calls for freedom protests across Pakistan Former PM urges supporters to rally at the end of your streets and villages and sacrifice in push for immediate electionsPakistans former prime minister Imran Khan has called for nationwide freedom protests on Sunday after his brief arrest and detention last week triggered deadly unrestThe onetime cricket superstar  who has been tied up in dozens of legal cases since being ousted from power in April 2022  was freed on bail on Friday after his detention was declared unlawful by the supreme court Continue reading
Translated Text: Imran Khan calls for freedom protests across Pakistan Former PM urges supporters to rally at the end of your streets and villages and sacrifice in push for immediate electionsPakistans former prime minister Imran Khan has called for nationwide freedom protests on Sunday after his brief arrest and detention last week triggered deadly unrestThe onetime cricket superstar  who has been tied up in dozens of legal cases since being ousted from power in April 2022  was freed on bail on Friday after his detention was declared unlawful by the supreme court Continue reading

Original Text: Pakistans democracy hangs by a thread says Imran Khan on return home after arrest Former prime minister steps up attacks on countrys military leaders as ministers plan to rearrest himThe crowds gathered peacefully jostling outside the home of the man they call the saviour of Pakistan hoping for a glimpse Two days earlier these same streets in the city of Lahore had resembled a warzone as tens of thousands of protesters violently took to the streets ransacking buildings burning cars throwing petrol bombs and clashing with police with several dying from gunshot woundsOn Saturday however there was calm Late the previous night former prime minister Imran Khan had finally returned to his home following some of the most tumultuous days in the countrys recent history that saw him arrested on Islamabad high court premises by 100 paramilitary officers He was detained for two days but then to the surprise of many observers was granted bail and allowed to walk free after his arrest was declared illegal by Pakistans supreme court With Khan released the violence eased Continue reading
Translated Text: Pakistans democracy hangs by a thread says Imran Khan on return home after arrest Former prime minister steps up attacks on countrys military leaders as ministers plan to rearrest himThe crowds gathered peacefully jostling outside the home of the man they call the saviour of Pakistan hoping for a glimpse Two days earlier these same streets in the city of Lahore had resembled a warzone as tens of thousands of protesters violently took to the streets ransacking buildings burning cars throwing petrol bombs and clashing with police with several dying from gunshot woundsOn Saturday however there was calm Late the previous night former prime minister Imran Khan had finally returned to his home following some of the most tumultuous days in the countrys recent history that saw him arrested on Islamabad high court premises by 100 paramilitary officers He was detained for two days but then to the surprise of many observers was granted bail and allowed to walk free after his arrest was declared illegal by Pakistans supreme court With Khan released the violence eased Continue reading

Original Text: Openbaar aanklager maakt brandhout van FBIonderzoek naar band tussen Trump en Rusland De FBI heeft zich gebaseerd op twijfelachtige informatie om een onderzoek te starten naar mogelijke banden tussen voormalig Amerikaans president Donald Trump en Rusland tijdens de presidentsverkiezingen van 2016 Meer nog de FBI is nadien nog verscheidene keren in de fout gegaan Dat schrijft openbaar aanklager John Durham in zijn eindrapport
Translated Text: Public prosecutor makes firewood of FBI investigation into Trump's relationship with Russia The FBI has based itself on questionable information to launch an investigation into possible ties between former US president Donald Trump and Russia during the 2016 presidential election More than once the FBI has gone wrong.

Original Text: UK government urged to act as some meat and veg prices double in a year Which and other groups call for intervention as food industry figures gather for summit with Rishi SunakSome meat and vegetable lines at supermarkets have almost doubled in price over the past year research has found prompting fresh calls for the government to intervene as food industry figures gather for summit in Downing StreetAnnual inflation on supermarket ownlabel budget items stepped up to 25 in April according to the data from consumer group Which while the rate of price increases on branded goods remained steady at just under 14 Continue reading
Translated Text: UK government urged to act as some meat and veg prices double in a year Which and other groups call for intervention as food industry figures gather for summit with Rishi SunakSome meat and vegetable lines at supermarkets have almost doubled in price over the past year research has found prompting fresh calls for the government to intervene as food industry figures gather for summit in Downing StreetAnnual inflation on supermarket ownlabel budget items stepped up to 25 in April according to the data from consumer group Which while the rate of price increases on branded goods remained steady at just under 14 Continue reading

Original Text: Man charged as pregnant woman dies in motorway crash Frankie JulesHough was fatally injured in crash on M66 in Greater Manchester on SaturdayA pregnant woman has died after a motorway crash that also left her son and nephew badly hurtFrankie JulesHough 38 was fatally injured at about 310pm on Saturday on the M66 in Bury Greater Manchester Her son Tommy nine Tobias Spencer four who is believed to be her nephew and her other son Rocky two were also hurt Continue reading

Original Text: Man arrested on suspicion of double murder in Huddersfield Bodies of man and woman were found by paramedics in house in Dalton area on Monday morningA man in his 30s has been arrested on suspicion of a double murder in West Yorkshire after paramedics attended an address where they discovered two bodiesPolice were called to a house in the Dalton area of Huddersfield at 953am on Monday after paramedics found a man and a woman who had suffered multiple injuries and had died at the scene Continue reading

Original Text: UK interest rate rises are taking the labour market off the boil Number of vacancies falls and more people rejoin workforce  but work is needed on skills and ill healthUK payroll numbers fall as unemployment rate rises to 39There are signs the Bank of Englands interest rate rises are making businesses think twice about hiring staff bringing down the number of vacanciesPushing in the same direction the high cost of living is driving more people back into the workforce Continue reading
